Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Cumin
B. Groundnut
C. Cinnamon
D. Pepper
E. Clove

In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Biscuits
B. Chocolate
C. Cake
D. Bread
E. Pastry
Solution: All except Chocolate are baked items.

Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Sweep
B. Wipe
C. Scrub
D. Wash
E. Stain
Solution: All except Stain are terms related to cleaning.

Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Coat
B. Shirt
C. Blouse
D. Trousers
E. Sweater
Solution: All except Trousers are garments which cover the upper part of the body.

Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Asia
B. Argentina
C. Africa
D. Australia
E. Antarctica
Solution: All except Argentina are continents, while Argentina is a country.
